title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the structural barrier to voting in the scenario. The response must include a reference to the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the structural barrier described in part A may be more of an obstacle in some states than in others.

For Task C, the response must explain how an increase in youth voter turnout could affect the way candidates run campaigns in the future.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
